com.tealium.audiencestream

Class AudienceStream.Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tealium.audiencestream.AudienceStream.Config
  • Enclosing class:
    AudienceStream

    public static final class AudienceStream.Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Required to enable the AudienceStream library.

    It has various setters for optional configuration options which return instances of itself for method chaining.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudienceStream.Config

        public AudienceStream.Config(Context context,
                     java.lang.String accountName,
                     java.lang.String profileName,
                     java.lang.String environmentName)
        Parameters:
        context - the current context reference
        accountName - the account name provided by Tealium
        profileName - the profile for this project
        environmentName - the development environment for this configuration, conventionally: "dev", "qa", or "prod".
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when any of the parameters are null or any of the strings are empty.

    • Method Detail

      • setHttpsEnabled

        public AudienceStream.Config setHttpsEnabled(boolean isHttpsEnabled)
        Determine whether networking scheme is HTTP or HTTPS.
        Parameters:
        isHttpsEnabled - use HTTPS when true, HTTP otherwise.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • setLogLevel

        public AudienceStream.Config setLogLevel(int logLevel)
        Set the volume of which this library prints logs in LogCat.

        Available volumes are:

        • Log#VERBOSE
        • Log#DEBUG
        • Log#INFO
        • Log#WARN
        • Log#ERROR
        • Log#ASSERT

        Any value provided other than these will be interpreted as "SILENT".

        The default is Log#WARN.

        Parameters:
        logLevel - the desired log-level (2-7) for varying verbosity, any other value for SILENT.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • setOverrideProfile

        public AudienceStream.Config setOverrideProfile(java.lang.String profileName)
        Use the provided profile instead of "main" for data layer enrichment.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        a human-readable description of the current configuration.
